DOC.brief_summary: This study seeks to compare the differences in effectiveness among individual patients treated at for hypertension with bedtime administration of amlodipine versus lisinopril. There will be an analysis of whether one medication was more effective than another and whether specific patient factors could predict who responded better to which one.
DOC.brief_title: Bedtime Administration of Amlodipine Versus Lisinopril
